title: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Furnishings (Tables, Consoles)", ca. 1937
description: Rough sketches of furniture and interior designs for the Harold S. Anderson house, Bel Air, CA. At left is drawing for a console table and large rectangular mirror above table. Table extends to size of dining table with four chairs. Drawing for console table and mirror to right with a decorative floral arrangment or object on table top. Drawing for room at upper center, showing console table and mirror/dining room table at left, and narrow rectangular console table and figurine atop at right. Various furniture arranged in center of room. Rough sketches of furniture throughout margins of paper.
